dcterms:creator: D. Raghu
S. Agarwal
S. Joshi
M. Mausam
dcterms:description: FloDial is a troubleshooting dialogue corpus containing 1,789 dialogues grounded on ten individual flowcharts from two main domains: vehicle and laptop. The dialogues are designed to help diagnose user problems by following the instructions of flowcharts.
dcterms:title: FloDial
